entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Burlington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 12:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023
Temperature: -0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: N 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow and local blowing snow beginning late in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming north 30 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
